SummaryEnglish: In the middle of winter, a hot and blustery cold battle is unfolding at Heights Alliance. Third-year Mirio Togata appears suddenly as the first-year students in Class A are bored during their ban from going outside. He brings with him the card game "Yūei Heroes Battle," created by the support class. As each student picks cards and joins the fierce battle, there seems to be more to the game than meets the eye.
Aliases: 僕のヒーローアカデミア 　雄英ヒーローズ・バトル
Boku no Hero Academia: UA Heroes Battle
My Hero Academia UA Heroes Battle
